summary: Sucker Punch Productions is an American video game company based in Washington. They make action games for PlayStation, like Sly Cooper, Infamous, and Ghost of Tsushima. Founded in 1997, their first game, Rocket: Robot on Wheels, was a critical success. They then created the popular Sly Cooper series. After this, they made the Infamous games and were acquired by Sony. Their latest game, Ghost of Tsushima, sold over 13 million copies. They are now developing a sequel for the PlayStation 5.
title: Sucker Punch Productions
